tooltip.vsafe.safe_phys_thread_on:
Safe Phys Thread On determines whether the safe physics thread is enabled.
A game restart is required for this setting to fully take effect.
tooltip.vsafe.debug_mode:
Debug Mode controls the visibility of exceptions caught in the physics thread.(Default OnlyInLogST)
    Silent:No Debug
    OnlyInLog:Short exception message will be output in log
    OnlyInLogST:Exception with full stacktrace will be output in log
    DisplayInGame:Short exception message will be output in log and chat
    DisplayInGameST:Short exception message in chat, full stacktrace in log
